cardseteditor

Class CardInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cardseteditor.CardInfo

  • public class CardInfo
extends Object
    This class contains the information about a card that is being edited. This is different from the InternalFlashCard class, which is used for a card in a test.
    Since:
    5.0
    Version:
    5.0
    Author:
    David E. Reese

    • Field Summary

      Document for side 3 of the card.
      private int theCardNumber
      Number of the card.

         throws Error

      • CardInfo

        public CardInfo(int newCardNumber,
        String side1String,
        String side2String,
        String side3String)
         throws Error
        Constructor allowing the setting of information about the card.
        Parameters:
        newCardNumber - Number of the card (must be >= 1).
        side1String - String for side 1 of the card.
        side2String - String for side 2 of the card.
        side3String - String for side 3 of the card.
        Throws:
        Error - Thrown if newCardNumber < 1 or if bad location error was detected.

    • Method Detail

      • setCardSide1Text

        public void setCardSide1Text(String theString)
                      throws Error
        This method sets the text in side 1 of the card. Note that it overwrites any existing text.
        Parameters:
        theString - String containing text to be put in the card side.
        Throws:
        Error - Thrown if a bad location was detected.
